Reviews.Title: This replacement LCD screen display works fine
Reviews.Author: Ricardo
Reviews.Content: I am from Brazil and was in a business trip in Cincinnati, Ohio, US. I ordered this LCD display within just 7 days remaining before leaving the hotel. Although the site advised me it could take between 5 to 11 days to arrive, it took only 2 working days to be delivered. I am back home and have already instaled it in my camera. The display fitted the camera perfectly and it is working fine.

ProductInfo.Name: LCD Screen Display for Nikon Coolpix L11 Camera
